content:
The Collaborative Learning Center in the library is under construction PERIOD

After over a year of construction Bizzell Memorial Librarys updated Lower Level  will soon be open for students PERIOD

Construction on portions of Lower Level  the area that once housed the Bookmark Caf will be complete Sept PERIOD  when the Peggy V PERIOD Helmerich Collaborative Learning Center will open said Sarah Robbins a representative for the library PERIOD

The learning center project cost . million and was funded by state allowances and private donations PERIOD The Helmerich family donated  toward the project according to provided records and the library website PERIOD

The new collaborative learning center is geared toward group study and giving students space to work together Robbins said PERIOD The center is designed with large open windows for students to see into the librarys Canyon Garden according to a press release PERIOD

Eight new study rooms have been added for students to use for practicing presentations and for studying as a group PERIOD The rooms are equipped with white boards and digital displays for students to connect their laptops or tablets Robbins said PERIOD

The purpose of the space is to engage the community Robbins said PERIOD

The Bookmark Caf will return to its original location after being temporarily relocated during the construction Dean of University Libraries Richard Luce said PERIOD

The caf has been renovated to match the aesthetic of the new learning center and has an expanded menu Luce said PERIOD The caf will also include more customer seating areas according to a press release PERIOD

Construction on Lower Level  of the library has been underway since August  and library administrators are eager to open the new space to students Luce said PERIOD

Were really excited about it and excited to get students into the new space and see and hear the reaction Luce said PERIOD

A commemoration ceremony for the new space is set for Nov PERIOD  when OU President David Boren will speak PERIOD The Helmerich family will attend Robbins said PERIOD

Lower Level  renovation round up

The collaborative learning center renovation project began Aug PERIOD   PERIOD It involved the renovation of18000 gross square feet on the Lower Level of the Neustadt Wing in Bizzell Memorial Library PERIOD The center should open on Sept PERIOD  PERIOD The project cost . million which was paid for through state allowances and private donations PERIOD

title: Bizzell Memorial Library's Lower Level 1 will reopen Sept. 15 after year of construction | News | oudaily.com
name: University of Oklahoma
